mapper.sql: id, user_id, party_id, party_name, template_id, page_type, type, device_no, device_type, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT FROM tj_play_click WHERE id = #{value} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
INSERT INTO tj_play_click ( user_id, party_id, party_name, template_id, page_type, type, device_no, device_type, create_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{partyId}, #{partyName}, #{templateId}, #{pageType}, #{type}, #{deviceNo}, #{deviceType}, #{createTime})

INSERT INTO tj_play_click ( id, user_id, party_id, party_name, template_id, page_type, type, device_no, device_type, create_time ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.userId}, #{item.partyId}, #{item.partyName}, #{item.templateId}, #{item.pageType}, #{item.type}, #{item.deviceNo}, #{item.deviceType}, #{item.createTime})
